posts.title: Why Dark Mode Feels Like a Superpower - Prabhjot Singh
posts.body:
There's something magical about switching your editor to dark mode. Suddenly, you're not just a developer — you're a hacker in a movie, solving mysteries with every keystroke.

But beyond the cool aesthetic, dark mode is a productivity booster for many. It’s easier on the eyes, especially during late-night sessions, and it makes colorful syntax pop like fireworks.

Some say it’s a preference. Others say it’s a lifestyle. 

Either way, if you’re coding in light mode, are you even coding?
